TopicTitle: What is the icon in the top right?

Articles.Content:
Looks kinda like this:

((()))

Then when I hover it says "none".

Edited March 24, 2015 by buffs92
That is the contracts completed. After you start completing contracts it will tell you the number completed, something like (((15))). Clicking on the icon gives a list of completed contracts.

It's basically for incoming messages. The only thing generating messages in the stock game is the contract system. One of the mods I use is Science Funding, which gives funds and rep (and generates messages) when science is sent/returned home. Of course, sandbox mode won't generate any messages
